exchange.question: Hey, what happened to the Poptropolis Games?
exchange.answer: Don't you follow the blogs? The Games sank. They won't be back for another 100 years.

exchange.question: 100 years? But I want to play now!
exchange.answer: I was hoping you'd say that. There may be a loophole, if you want to help.

exchange.question: What can we do?
exchange.answer: We just need to dig up the island! Head into the diving chamber and help your tribe raise the games!

character.statement: Back again? Good. Head into the diving chamber and help your tribe raise the games!
Head into the diving chamber and help your tribe raise the Poptropolis Games!
Dont give up! Without the Poptropolis Games Im nothing but a good-looking guy with a microphone.
Another point for the [tribe]! You can dig as much as you want, or take the Tribal ferry to visit your tribe's common room.
Thats enough for today. I should come back tomorrow and dive again.
